DOC.brief_summary: This study explore combination oral drug PF-00299804 intravenous CP-751,871 patient advance solid tumor . Each drug give separately patient prior study , study establish safety efficacy combination .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety And Efficacy Study Of The Combination Of Oral PF-00299804 And Intravenous CP-751,871 Given Every 3 Weeks
DOC.criteria: Histologically document advanced cancer , Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) 01 ; Platelets > 100,000 , ANC > 1500 ; Ccr > 60 serum creat . < 1.5 Nonsmall cell cancer cohort : Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) 02 , prior platin , < 4 prior chemotherapy regimen HgA1C < 5.7 % Active Central Nervous System ( CNS ) metastases ; prior IGF1R target therapy Any history unstable angina , myocardial infarction symptomatic congestive heart failure .
DOC.keyword: advanced cancer refractory advance non-small cell lung cancer
